title: Many `elided lifetime has a name` warnings

labels.name: C-Code-Quality
labels.description: A section of code that is hard to understand or change

body:
## Bevy version

0.15.0-dev

## \[Optional\] Relevant system information

rustc 1.83.0-nightly (f79a912d9 2024-09-18)
Linux 6.10.10

## What went wrong

I got many `elided lifetime has a name` warning when compiling bevy:
```
warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:193:21
    |
190 |     fn read<'a>(
    |             -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
193 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<Box<dyn Reader + 'a>, AssetReaderError>>;
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`
    |
    = note: `#[warn(elided_named_lifetimes)]` on by default

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:198:21
    |
195 |     fn read_meta<'a>(
    |                  -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
198 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<Box<dyn Reader + 'a>, AssetReaderError>>;
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:203:21
    |
200 |     fn read_directory<'a>(
    |                       -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
203 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<Box<PathStream>, AssetReaderError>>;
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:205:65
    |
205 |     fn is_directory<'a>(&'a self, path: &'a Path) -> BoxedFuture<Result<bool, AssetReaderError>>;
    |                     -- lifetime `'a` declared here              ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:211:21
    |
208 |     fn read_meta_bytes<'a>(
    |                        -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
211 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<Vec<u8>, AssetReaderError>>;
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:218:21
    |
215 |     fn read<'a>(
    |             -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
218 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<Box<dyn Reader + 'a>, AssetReaderError>> {
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:227:21
    |
224 |     fn read_meta<'a>(
    |                  -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
227 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<Box<dyn Reader + 'a>, AssetReaderError>> {
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:236:21
    |
233 |     fn read_directory<'a>(
    |                       -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
236 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<Box<PathStream>, AssetReaderError>> {
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:239:65
    |
239 |     fn is_directory<'a>(&'a self, path: &'a Path) -> BoxedFuture<Result<bool, AssetReaderError>> {
    |                     -- lifetime `'a` declared here              ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:245:21
    |
242 |     fn read_meta_bytes<'a>(
    |                        -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
245 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<Vec<u8>, AssetReaderError>> {
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:354:58
    |
354 |     fn write<'a>(&'a self, path: &'a Path) -> BoxedFuture<Result<Box<Writer>, AssetWriterError>>;
    |              -- lifetime `'a` declared here              ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:360:21
    |
357 |     fn write_meta<'a>(
    |                   -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
360 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<Box<Writer>, AssetWriterError>>;
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:362:59
    |
362 |     fn remove<'a>(&'a self, path: &'a Path) -> BoxedFuture<Result<(), AssetWriterError>>;
    |               -- lifetime `'a` declared here              ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:365:64
    |
365 |     fn remove_meta<'a>(&'a self, path: &'a Path) -> BoxedFuture<Result<(), AssetWriterError>>;
    |                    -- lifetime `'a` declared here              ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:371:21
    |
367 |     fn rename<'a>(
    |               -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
371 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<(), AssetWriterError>>;
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:378:21
    |
374 |     fn rename_meta<'a>(
    |                    -- lifetime `'a` declared here
...
378 |     ) -> BoxedFuture<Result<(), AssetWriterError>>;
    |                     ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
   --> crates/bevy_asset/src/io/mod.rs:380:69
    |
380 |     fn remove_directory<'a>(&'a self, path: &'a Path) -> BoxedFuture<Result<(), AssetWriterError>>;
    |                         -- lifetime `'a` declared here              ^ this elided lifetime gets resolved as `'a`

warning: elided lifetime has a name
```
